information.name: ucrm-client-sendgrid
information.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend form for clients to signup.
information.author: Jared Mollenkamp

configuration.label: Form Title
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before form description

configuration.label: Form Description
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before the form. (Can contain HTML)

configuration.label: Completion Text
configuration.description: Text shown upon signup completion. (Text Only)

configuration.label: From Email
configuration.description: Alerts From Email (Send Grid Domain Only)

configuration.label: To Name
configuration.description: Name of Person to Send Alerts to
